attributes.action: Cease contact with Arab and Muslim states that do not recognize Israel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call upon the government to demand that Arab and Muslim states that we are in contact with recognise Israel, and that if they fail to do so, that we cease contact with them.

It is hypocritical to demand that the Palestinian's democratically elected leadership must recognise Israel, when this same standard is not required of other countries.

If Britain wishes to play a proactive role in SOLVING the conflict as opposed to going down the same old predictable paths that have lead nowhere for decades, then it must take a new approach.
